channel.title: IF Answers - Recent questions tagged commands

item.title: Is there a known bug with commands not functioning?
item.description:
I'm in a situation where I am exactly recreating the say command as covered in this tutorial:

http://docs.textadventures.co.uk/quest/tutorial/custom_commands.html

Yet in the game, the "say" command does not function. Is this a known bug? Are there any known ways to fix this?
